name: @zereight/mcp-gitlab
description: MCP server for using the GitLab API
author: zereight

scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p build/resources/config && mkdir -p build/resources/tools && mkdir -p build/resources/gitlab-api-docs/content && cp -R resources/gitlab-api-docs/content/* build/resources/gitlab-api-docs/content/ && mkdir -p build/gitlab-api-docs && cp -R resources/gitlab-api-docs/content build/gitlab-api-docs/ && mkdir -p build/resources/gitlab-cli-docs/content && cp -R resources/gitlab-cli-docs/content/* build/resources/gitlab-cli-docs/content/ && mkdir -p build/gitlab-cli-docs && cp -R resources/gitlab-cli-docs/content build/gitlab-cli-docs/
